Package aom.scripting.ui.config

Class InputConfig

Object
InputConfig
public class InputConfig
extends Object
This class provides an overview of Configs related to keyboard and mouse input.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    bool allowMultipleBinds
    Deprecated.
    Completely messes up your hotkey configuration.
    bool alwaysDrawCursor  
    bool alwaysShowWindowsCursor
    Forces Windows cursor to always be displayed.
    bool directInput
    Forces windows mouse and keyboard.
    bool forceDirectInput
    Uses directInput instead of any windows events.
    bool joystick
    Joystick support.
    bool joystickButtonEvents  
    bool joystickMouse
    Control the mouse cursor/buttons with the joystick.
    bool joystickMoveEvents  
    bool joystickNonExclusive  
    bool joystickPositionEvents  
    bool mouseExclusive  
    bool mouseNonExclusive  
    float mouseScaleX
    Deprecated. 
    float mouseScaleY
    Deprecated. 
    bool mouseStartCentered
    Mouse is moved to the center of the screen on startup.
    bool pollMousePosition  
    bool rawMouseMove  
    float realScrollSpeed
    Speed of normal scrolling.
    float scrollSpeed
    The scroll speed (unused)
    bool win32Keyboard
    Use native windows keyboard events instead of DirectInput.
    bool win32Mouse
    Use native windows mouse events instead of DirectInput.
    bool windowsCursor
    Forces Windows cursor to always be displayed and no in-game cursor.

  • Field Details

    • allowMultipleBinds

      public bool allowMultipleBinds
      Deprecated.
      Completely messes up your hotkey configuration.
      When input mappings are overbound in a context, both are evaluated.
